# Barbarian's Kit
## Overview
This kit includes a backpack, a belt pouch, a blanket, a flint and steel, an iron pot, rope, soap, torches (10), trail rations (5 days), and a waterskin.

**Price** 9 gp; **Weight** 26 lbs.

**Source:** Ultimate Equipment, pg. 56
